title.abbrev: Federal Information Processing Standards Publication 98 27 January 1983 Announcing the Standard for MESSAGE FORMAT FOR COMPUTER BASED MESSAGE SYSTEMS

front.title: Specification for message format for Computer Based Message Systems

abstract.t: This RFC is FIPS 98. The purpose of distributing this document as an RFC is to make it easily accesible to the ARPA research community. This RFC does not specify a standard for the ARPA Internet.
